name: test_e2e_with_logs[119_XSS_POLY_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_POLY_007` |
| **Name** | Polyglot event handler |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | polyglot |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `jaVasCript:/*-/*`/*' /*onerror=alert(1)// */`
- **Encoded**: `jaVasCript%3A%2F*-%2F*%60%2F*'%20%2F*onerror%3Dalert(1)%2F%2F%20*%2F`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~25000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:42:11.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=XSS_POLY_007-1767433331405-om8jpq pattern_id=XSS_POLY_007 uri=/?q=jaVasCript%3A%2F*-%2F*%60%2F*'%20%2F*onerror%3Dalert(1)%2F%2F%20*%2F client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
